name: A Swing Monkey
description:
[Game Introduction]

Giving a gift to a girl friend, Monkey scrolling game

Speed in a side-scrolling game.
National swing game!
Escape Boring routine!
Cool ~ ~ ~ ~ take a rope and explore mysterious Land!
Monsters being added each stage!.

[Game configuration]
Chapter1-Jungle. 12stage
Chapter2-Ice Land. 12stage
Chapter3-Fire Cave. 12stage
And More ...

[How to play]
a. Jump: jumps when you touch the screen.
b. Touch the screen when monkey is on Jump
c. Cut the rope by touch.
